Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and unique features, I believe it's worth more than what others have paid, but considering your preferences and needs, I'm willing to offer it to you for $120. This price not only reflects the value we place on customer satisfaction but also ensures you get the best deal possible. Don't hesitate to ask if you have any questions about the product or need further details. Looking forward to your positive response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
